name: df-rest
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(crest, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, crn(cmpt(s2, cv(s0), cin(cv(s2), cv(s1))))))
comment: Function returning the subspace topology induced by the topology ` y ` and the set ` x ` . (Contributed by FL, 20-Sep-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2015.)
